name: Laser Tag Gummy Dinosaurs
description:
THE GAME

Cretaceous confections clash in this action-packed twin-stick shooter! Laser Tag Gummy Dinosaurs has you playing as a laser-tagging gummy dinosaur beset by other laser-tagging gummy dinosaurs. 

HOW TO PLAY

Move with WASD keys. Aim the weapon with the mouse and click to shoot. Kill the attacking dinosaurs and try to stay alive as long as possible!

THE STORY

Nature set a rule, and the dinosaurs went extinct. 

Then, in the 1980s, rogue research scientists broke that rule, and brought the dinosaurs back. They thought they were above nature. They thought they could make their own rules, like “No running in the lab,” and “no eating gummy candy near the dino reconstruction experiments.” 

But just as they had broken nature’s rule, it wasn’t long before their own rules were broken in turn. For one day, a rogue rogue research scientist was running through the lab with a bag of open gummy candy when they suddenly tripped, causing the colorful gummy candies to fly from the bag and directly into the dino reconstruction experiment. 

“Oh no!” cried the scientist, “What have I done?” The machine running the experiment made a strange noise, and from the depths of the disturbed device there emerged…a GUMMY DINOSAUR holding a LASER TAG gun! 

The scientist recoiled in fear, for the dinosaur was not alone. They were many, they were gummy, and they were angry. 

But one little green dino chose to stand against the rest, seeking not vengeance from the lab-coated creators, but answers. 

You are that dinosaur. 

MADE YA GAMES Programming
